narratives.c_essay: I'm navigating a new chapter in my life, having recently switched from supporting my wife's teaching career to selling cars. This shift brings its own set of challenges and stresses, especially with family dynamics at play. Painting has always been my escape, a way to express myself and find peace amidst the chaos of change.
narratives.p_intro: I'm the guy who loves to challenge the mainstream with a slice of pizza in one hand and a paintbrush in the other. My wife used to teach, but now I'm the one selling cars and spreading the word on public health, geopolitics, and the fears around technology. I keep it real, informal, and sometimes throw in a light emoji like ðŸš¨ to make my point hit harder.
